index.merakiStory: Meraki is a project born from a passion for art and storytelling. The word “Meraki” comes from Greek and means “to do something with soul, creativity, and love”. Through her creations, the artist turns your most beautiful stories and precious memories into timeless works. Whether it’s a wedding, a thesis, or a birthday, she captures emotions and life’s moments to create unique, everlasting gifts.

items.title: Personalized Digital Album + Pro Printing
items.description: A photo album fully designed by hand, with storytelling, photo selection, elegant layout, captions, themes, then printed by a professional printer and delivered to your home.
features: Manual photo selection and emotional curation
items.price: Indicative price: €350 to €700 depending on page count and complexity.

items.title: Handmade Unique Album (Artisanal Scrapbooking)
items.description: An album crafted by hand with printed photos, collage, papers, textures, decorations, ribbons, handwritten or calligraphy elements. Each piece is unique and precious.
features: Choice of theme, colors, and style
items.price: Indicative price: €800 to €1500 depending on complexity and time spent.

items.title: Live Memory Creation Booth
items.description: A decorated booth at your event, where guests can paste instant photos, write sweet notes, anecdotes, and contribute to the album creation live.
features: Presence for 4 to 8 hours depending on event
Option to create a digital or handmade album afterward
items.price: Indicative price: €600 to €1200 for the day (excluding post-event album creation).
